description:
Hellfall

Hellfall is a 2D platformer, vertical scroller game. It was created by a team of 5 videogame development students. We had lots of fun creating this project, so we hope you enjoy it as well. :)

HOW TO PLAY?

You can play with a keyboard or an Xbox controller with the following controls:

Controls Keyboard
  • A D  ➨ Move left/right
  • Spacebar  ➨ jump
  • L ➨ Attack (to the direction chosen with WASD)
  • K  ➨ Dash
Controls Xbox Controller
  • L  joystick➨ Move
  • A button  ➨Jump
  • B button  ➨Dash
  • L trigger ➨ Attack ( to L joystick direction)
LORE

You've fallen in the shower and died... ending up in hell. Rumour has it that the only way to gain your life back is going down hell... and defeating the creature inhabiting in its depths.

More description... Amazing combat

Enjoy amazing combat animations and combo system, while attacking midair! (All the animations you see are hand-drawn frame by frame ;) ).

Fight against time

Your time in hell is limited! Keep killing enemies in order to stay alive and reach the bottom.

Particles party

Slaying enemies never gets tired!

Download Instructions

1. Download the file called 'HellfallWindows'.

2. After downloading it, decompress the .zip file.

3. Lastly, open the game folder and run the .exe file.
